<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add Logging Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v32.04/settings/logging"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"manageAlerts","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Configures the logging settings.
This includes Syslog, Stdout, and Prometheus instrumentation.

For more information, see [Logging](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/30/prisma-cloud-compute-edition-admin/audit/logging).

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request that enables verbose scan output for syslog and stdout:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X POST \
 -d \
'{
   "syslog": {
     "enabled": true,
     "verboseScan": true,
     "allProcEvents": false,
     "addr": ""
     },
   "stdout": {
     "enabled": true,
     "verboseScan": true,
     "allProcEvents": false,
     }   
}' \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/logging"
```


## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"consoleAddress"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ConsoleAddress is the console address used by the admin to access the console, used for creating links for runtime events.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enableMetricsCollection"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"EnableMetricsCollection indicates whether metric collections feature is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"includeRuntimeLink"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"IncludeRuntimeLink indicates whether link to forensic event should be included in the output.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>stdout</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

LoggerSetting are a specific logger settings

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"allProcEvents"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AllProcEvents indicates whether any new spawned container process should generate an event source entry.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether log feature is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"verboseScan"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"VerboseScan indicates whether detailed scan (Compliance/Vulnerability) result should be written to event logger.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>syslog</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

SyslogSettings are the syslog settings

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"addr"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Addr is the remote address for sending events.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"allProcEvents"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AllProcEvents indicates whether any new spawned container process should generate an event source entry.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Cert is the server cert for dialing TLS syslogger.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether log feature is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ID represents the user's custom identifier string.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"verboseScan"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"VerboseScan indicates whether detailed scan (Compliance/Vulnerability) result should be written to event logger.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK
